response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its rarity and quality, I understand that its true worth may be subjective to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product for $2,000,000. I believe this price reflects its exceptional nature and the potential it holds for you. Should you decide this is within your budget and aligns with your interests, I would be honored to facilitate the transaction. If you need more information or have any concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 2000000}
